1.11.2.1.11-0.0.1.2: Fixed crash when editing Lore (wrong import)
1.11.2.1.11-0.0.1.3: Fixed crashing when adding enchantments on a server
1.11.2.1.11.2-0.0.2.0: Added temporary buttons to scroll in the Enchantment list, added safeEnchantmentsFirst and globalEnchantmentsLast config options
1.11.2.1.11.2-0.0.2.1: Added config GUI - no need to restart the game or the world, changes apply directly !
1.11.2.1.11.2-0.0.3.0: Added Hide Flags support, rewritten Enchantment screen, fixed crash when trying to open the GUI in survival mode or without item in hand
1.11.2.1.11.2-0.0.3.1: Fixed crash when editing Hide Flags of a new item
1.11.2.1.11.2-0.0.3.2: Added support to all HideFlags, fixed minor bugs
1.11.2.1.11.2-0.0.3.3: Fixed button size in the 'Hide Flags' menu
1.11.2.1.11.x-0.1.0.0-beta1:
Rewrite : GUI system (internal only)
Rewrite : ItemStack gestion (intenal only)
Rewrite : Events - you can now edit an item from your inventory
Rewrite : Changed some class' names (internal only)
Added : Attribute Modifiers support
Added : Unbreakable item ('Enchantments' menu)
Added : Colors everywhere!
Added : Config option 'pauseGame'
Removed : Client-side updates, they're now server-side only (no big changes)
Fix : Empty lore lines not removing
Fix : Localization issues
1.11.2.1.11.x-0.1.0.0-beta2:
Rewrite : Networking (internal only)
Added : List for the Lore section
Added : Format button texture
Added : More custom GUI classes (internal only)
Added : Forge auto-updater support
